snippet: Third seed Stan Wawrinka rose to the occasion once again to beat top-seeded defending champion Novak Djokovic 6-7(1) 6-4 7-5 6-3 and win the U.S. Open on Sunday for the third grand slam title of his career....
lead_paragraph: Third seed Stan Wawrinka rose to the occasion once again to beat top-seeded defending champion Novak Djokovic 6-7(1) 6-4 7-5 6-3 and win the U.S. Open on Sunday for the third grand slam title of his career.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Wins U.S. Open, Tops Djokovic in Four Sets
headline.main: Wawrinka Wins U.S. Open, Tops Djokovic in Four Sets
